questiontext.text:
Completa la tabla de la función de transición para el AFD que se obtendría al aplicar el método de construcción de subconjuntos al AFND de la expresión regular ((a|b*)a*c)*

$$\mathcal{Q}/\Sigma$$ a b c
A {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%B~C~A~F} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%C~B~D~F} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%D~B~E~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%0, 1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 11, 13~0, 1, 2, 4, 7, 8, 9, 11, 12, 13~0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 7, 8, 9, 11, 13~0, 1, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 11, 13}
B {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%E~F~C~B} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~D~E~C} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%D~B~C~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%3, 8, 9, 10, 11~3, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11~0, 3, 8, 9, 10, 11~3, 8, 9, 10}
C {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%E~F~C~B} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%C~D~A~F} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%D~F~E~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 11~5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 11, 12~2, 5, 6, 8, 9, 11~2, 6, 7, 8, 9, 11}
D {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%B~C~D~F} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%C~D~A~F} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%D~B~C~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 11, 12, 13~1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 11, 12~1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 12, 13~1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 11, 13}
E {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%E~D~F~B} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~E~D~C} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%D~E~F~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%9, 10, 11~4, 9, 10, 11~2, 10, 11~8, 9, 11}
F {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~D~E~B} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~D~E~C} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~D~E~B} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%Cjto. vacío~5~11~10}





















Los estados finales son: {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%A, D~D, E~C, D~A, B, D}

Completa la tabla de la función de transición para el AFD que se obtendría al aplicar el método de construcción de subconjuntos al AFND de la expresión regular (a|b*)c*a

$$\mathcal{Q}/\Sigma$$ a b c
A {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%B~C~A~E} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%C~D~E~F} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%D~F~B~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%0, 1, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 10~0, 1, 3, 4, 6, 7, 9, 10~0, 1, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10~0, 1, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10}
B {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%E~D~F~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~D~E~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%D~F~B~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%2, 7, 8, 10, 11~1, 2, 7, 10, 11~2, 8, 10, 11~1, 7, 8, 10, 11}
C {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%E~C~D~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%C~E~B~F} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%D~C~E~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10~1, 4, 5, 6, 7, 10~4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 11~2, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10}
D {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%E~D~C~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~E~D~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%D~C~B~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%8, 9, 10~6, 9, 10~7, 9, 10~5, 9, 10}
E {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~E~D~C} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~E~D~B} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~E~D~C} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%11~4~1, 11~4, 11}
F {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~E~D~C} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~E~D~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~D~E~B} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%Cjto. vacío~11~5~8}





















Los estados finales son: {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%B, E~B, D~B~E, F}
